law.catch_line: The Secretary shall provide a copy of this subtitle and Subtitle 1 of this title:...

text.section:
The Secretary shall provide a copy of this subtitle and Subtitle 1 of this title:
To the extent possible, to any person who in this State manufactures, packs, stores, or sells, at wholesale or retail, any food, drug, device, or cosmetic; and
To any person who requests it.

The Secretary may:
Publish summaries of judgments, decrees, or court orders issued under this subtitle;
Otherwise collect, report, or illustrate the results of any investigation conducted under this subtitle; and
Disseminate any information regarding any food, drug, device, or cosmetic if the Secretary considers the information necessary for the public health or for the protection of consumers against fraud.
